name: empanada
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a baked or fried snack or small dish from South America, consisting of pastry filled with a savoury or sweet mixture: I'd like a beef empanada to start, and a cold drink. Press the edges of the empanadas with a fork to seal them before baking.
More examplesFewer examplesMany countries have their own version of an empanada.We got delicious empanadas from a stand in the street.My empanada was stuffed only with melted cheese.I had a deep-fried corn empanada stuffed with spicy shredded beef.We finished our meal with berry empanadas and cream.
